Class RedstoneChips

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin
public class RedstoneChips
extends org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin

RedstoneChips Bukkit JavaPlugin implementation. The main entry point of the plugin.

Author:
Tal Eisenberg

getCircuitLoader

public CircuitLoader getCircuitLoader()
Returns the circuit loader. The object responsible for creating new instances of Circuit classes.

getCircuitManager

public CircuitManager getCircuitManager()
Returns the circuit manager. The object responsible for creating and managing active circuits.

getChannelManager

public ChannelManager getChannelManager()
Returns the channel manager. The object responsible for handling wireless broadcast channels.

getCircuitPersistence

public CircuitPersistence getCircuitPersistence()
Returns the circuit persistence handle. The object responsible for saving and loading the active circuit list from storage.

getUserSession

public UserSession getUserSession(String username,
                                  boolean create)
Returns the UserSession object tied to this username.

Parameters:
username - The player name.
create - Whether to create a new UserSession if none exists yet or not.
Returns:
The player UserSession or null if none was found and create is false.

getUserSession

public UserSession getUserSession(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                  boolean create)
Returns the UserSession object tied to this player.

Parameters:
player - The requested UserSession player.
create - Whether to create a new UserSession if none exists yet or not.
Returns:
The player UserSession or null if none was found and create if false.

removeUserSession

public UserSession removeUserSession(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
Removes the UserSession for the specified player.

Returns:
The UserSession object that was removed or null if it was not found.

removeUserSession

public UserSession removeUserSession(String name)
Removes the UserSession for the specified username.

Returns:
The UserSession object that was removed or null if it was not found.

addRCTypeReceiver

public void addRCTypeReceiver(org.bukkit.Location typingBlock,
                              RCTypeReceiver circuit)
Registers a typingBlock to be used by an RCTypeReceiver. When a player points towards the typingBlock and uses the /rctype command the RCTypeReceiver will receive the typed text.

Parameters:
typingBlock - The block to point towards while typing.
circuit - The circuit that will receive the typed text.

removeRCTypeReceiver

public void removeRCTypeReceiver(RCTypeReceiver circuit)
The RCTypeReceiver will no longer receive /rctype commands.

Parameters:
circuit - The rcTypeReceiver to remove.
